articles.author: The Star Online
articles.description: Foreigners have poured a net $97 million into local stocks this month through March 22, while withdrawing a combined $1 billion from four other Southeast Asian markets tracked by Bloomberg.
articles.title: Turning point for Bursa beckons as foreigners pile in - The Star Online
